oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Can Johne's Disease (Paratuberculosis) be Eradicated?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Larsen, Aubrey B.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: I will begin by briefly reviewing the symptoms of Johne's disease. Then I will discuss some of the reasons that this disease has not been controlled and eradicated and the extent of our knowledge about this disease.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1974; 46-48
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Copyright (c) 1974 American Association of Bovine Practitioners
